duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for setting up assigned tables for banquet functions and warmly serving guests with food and beverages.
Complete pre-function side work as designated by the Banquet Captain or Banquet Managers.
Adhere to all liquor liability laws and details described on Banquet Event Orders (BEOs).
Educate oneself and be familiar with liquor liability laws and set tables to specifications with excellent customer service experience.

education_certification.credential: Legal age requirement to serve alcohol.
